english.segment1: Blessed are those who dwell in Your house. They are ever praising You. Blessed are those whose strength is in You. Whose hearts are set on our God
english.segment3: We will go from strength to strength. Until we see You face to face
english.segment4: Hear our prayer. Oh Lord, God almighty. Come bless our land. As we seek You. Worship You
english.segment5: For You are holy. For You are holy. For You are holy, Lord
